item.title: Distrohopping 2014
item.description: There are so many good distributions, it is hard to settle on just one. For me, anyway. In the past when I’ve started hopping, I’ve almost always wound up using Fedora or some debian-based distro like Linux Mint. Then I go back and forth. I’ve been using LM for quite some time now (Debian Edition on 2 PCs, LM17 on 2 PCs) and plus Ubuntu desktop on one laptop and Ubuntu Server on my VPS and home server.
